text: Titia choutha sorgodoth tai laga bhigul bojaise, aru suryo laga tin bhag te lagi jaise, aru chand laga tin bhag eneka hoise aru tara khan laga tin bhag bhi eneka hoi jaise, etu pora tin bhag pura andhera hoi jaise. Din laga tin bhag te ujala nathaka hoise, aru etu nisena rati bhi eneka hoi jaise8.12 Isa. 13:10; Joe. 2:10..
